Welcome to Image Simulation RecipesÂ¶

A “recipe” is a python script that makes a set of simulated images given some basic ingredients. The instructions typically involve the use of “utensils,” which are re-usable tools for carrying out basic operations. You can browse the recipes and admire our utensils by following the links below.

  • recipes package
  • utensils package

Like any good cook, you’ll want to adapt our recipes for your own needs. If you’d like to submit your recipes to this cookbook for others to use, please follow the recipe for writing a good recipe at the link below.

  • Recipe to write a good recipe
  • Index
  • Search Page

Table Of Contents

  • recipes package
  • utensils package
  • Recipe to write a good recipe
